title: Are They on the Right Team? | The Answer
description:
Chris and Seerat go through all 30 NBA franchises and discuss real, possible, and hypothetical roster moves that could elevate each one as the trade deadline approaches.
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Seerat Sohi
Production Assistant: Chris Sutton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
